column4: hehe, I have not anyhow :), on the other hand, I'd think you should be able to install a .deb skipping dependencies :), I believe -prefork is the older version of -worker?
I'll run apt from the cmd line and get the errors for you
you can always just do a -> sudo apt-get -d install PACKAGE;  to just get the .deb files, and then install manually yourself from /var/cache/apt/archives :)
